error.UNSUPPORT_VERSION: This server version is not supported.
error.WRONG_CONNECT: Unable to connect to the server, please check if the network connection is unobstructed.
error.LOGIN_FAILED: Cannot log in to the server temporarily.
error.WRONG_ACCOUNT: The account or password is incorrect.
error.WRONG_DATA: The data returned by the server is incorrect.
error.SOCKET_CLOSE: The server connection has been disconnected, please log in again.
error.SOCKET_ERROR: The server connection failed with an unknown error.
error.NET_OFFLINE: The internet connection has been disconnected.
error.KICKOFF: The current account has been logged in elsewhere. If it is not my operation, please change the password in time.
error.USER_DATA_PATH_DENY: The user directory is temporarily unavailable. Please try again.
error.USER_DENY_ATTACT_UPLOAD: You do not have permission to upload files to the server, please contact the administrator.
error.IMAGE_NOT_FIND: Unable to open image, image not found or image corrupted. Location {0}.
error.UPLOAD_FILE_IS_TOO_LARGE: File upload failed, only supports sending files smaller than {0}
error.SERVER_DISABLED_UPLOAD: File upload failed because the server has disabled the file upload function
error.SERVER_IS_BUSY: The server is busy, please try again later.
error.STATUS_401: The correct user and password are required.
error.SOCKET_AbnormalClosure: The connection to the server terminated unexpectedly.
error.Unauthorized: User authentication failed, username or password is incorrect.
error.SERVER_VERSION_NOT_SUPPORT: The current client ({0}) does not support the connected server version {1}, which requires a server version of {2} or higher.
error.SERVER_VERSION_NOT_SUPPORT_IN_BROW: The browser side ({0}) does not support the connected server version {1} and requires a server version of {2} or higher.
error.RANZHI_SERVER_NOTSET: The server settings were not found.
error.COMMON_ERROR: The operation failed. Please try again later.
